hero.subtitle: High-precision dental implant systems for professionals since 2001.

catalogPage.subTitle: The Special Implant System
catalogPage.intro: Stability of conical design. Uniform distribution of occlusal forces through internal hex connection. Ideal integration with the bone through SLA surface treatment.

conicalDesign.title: The Special Conical Implant Design
conicalDesign.content: The special self-tapping and deep threads of the implant shape allow for easy implantation, guarantee high primary stability immediately after implantation, and are suitable for all bone types.

hexConnection.title: The Internal Hex Connection
hexConnection.content: Enables increased prosthetic accuracy, strength, stability, and easier placement of abutments and impression posts, and ensures uniform distribution of occlusal forces.

combinedBenefits.title: The Special Conical Design and Deep Internal Hex Connection
combinedBenefits.content: Combine the surgical flexibility of a parallel-walled and conical implant design with the stability and aesthetic benefits of an internal prosthetic connection.

slaSurface.title: SLA Surface Treatment: (Sand-blasted, Acid-etched)
slaSurface.content: The SLA surface is created by coarse sandblasting with corundum particles, achieving a macro-roughness of the titanium surface.

advantages.title: Advantages of SLA Surface Treatment:
items: Guarantees ideal integration and rapid anchoring of the implant in the surrounding bone, resulting in fast healing and osseointegration.
A proven process for the implant contact surface.
Offers excellent and rapid bone integration of SLA implants in the initial healing phase.

aboutPage.title: About AL-Technology
aboutPage.subtitle: Premium dental implant systems since 2001.
aboutPage.mission: Our mission is to provide dentists and surgeons worldwide with high-precision, reliable, and aesthetically pleasing implant solutions.
aboutPage.historyContent: AL-Technology was founded with the aim of improving the quality of dental implantology through innovation and technical excellence.
